description:
Johnny has analgesia, an inability to feel pain. Hazama and Maiko do their best to investigate the cause of Johnny`s condition. They are at an impasse when they have a chance encounter with Yabu, who came to consult Dr. Risenberg about PTSD in one of his own patients, Tommy. Upon learning that Tommy was in the same platoon as Johnny, Hazama feels certain he`s found the best source of information, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 苦痛なき革命 その2
